data.title: 5th parliamentary term
data.meta_description: Profile page - Silvio BERLUSCONI - Profile page of a current Member of the European Parliament - History of parliamentary service during the 5th legislative term including memberships in political groups, national parties, parliamentary committees and delegations as well as parliamentary activities and the declaration of financial interests.
data.text:
Political groups

20-07-1999 / 02-04-2000 : Group of the European People's Party (Christian Democrats) and European Democrats - Member

03-04-2000 / 10-06-2001 : Group of the European People's Party (Christian Democrats) and European Democrats - Member of the Bureau

National parties

20-07-1999 / 10-06-2001 : Forza Italia (Italy)

Member

21-07-1999 / 10-06-2001 : Committee on Foreign Affairs, Human Rights, Common Security and Defence Policy
